tasks.task: Build and operate a simplified underground wheat farm using pistons.
subtasks: Install a single source block of water.
Set up floodgates using normal pistons.
Connect the pistons to a redstone trail.
Activate the lever to manage water flow.
Adjust the farm width for maximum wheat planting (90 plants).
Use the system to collect items without walking in water.
Adapt the system for other crops (e.g., mushroom farms).
